name: Osaka USA
description:
Deliver ramen! 

These delicious noodles aren’t gonna deliver themselves. Balance your bike AND the steaming ramen bowls and make sure not to crash!

  • 🍜Chaotic physics-based ramen delivery sim 
  • 💫Don’t drop it like it’s hot: Control your bike and your ramen arm at the same time
  • 💥Keep your balance and don’t crash
  • 🏡 Explore a lively 3D town
  • 📢 Ring the bell!

############

Controls 

[WASD] Steer and accelerate your bike
[ARROW LEFT & RIGHT] Balance ramen
[SPACE] Honk!!

############

by
